messages.subject: Re: scientology and unschooling
messages.msgSnippet: I don t usually post here, but I am a Scientologist and wanted to say that if you truly want to know more about it, try Scientology.org as a place to begin.
messages.messageBody:
I don't usually post here, but I am a Scientologist and wanted to say that if
you truly want to know more about it, try Scientology.org as a place to
begin. Specifically on children you can try:
http://www.scientology.org/en_US/religion/catechism/pg012.html

And just as my opinion which should be taken for whatever it's worth to you,
but it not only sounds like Tia didn't have a very happy experience with
Scientology, but it also sounds like her parents severly misinterpreted
Scientology principles. If a child said "I hate you, Mom" and was met only
with a reply such as "Thank you", that's not a very sane reply. I've never
seen this in any of the Scientologists I've met.

JenW


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
